name: Giant Bomb Reality Victory
description:
During the Big Live Live Show 1000, Robo-Lang started a reality distortion machine that brought Giant Bomb characters to life across all of time. The world is overrun by giant bombs and it's up to Brad and Jeff to remedy the situation with violence. 

Supports xbox gamepads and up to two players. Use the in game input settings to change active controls. By default uses the first two xbox controllers.

Music by Antti Luode.
